channel.title: Moparscape Client Problem
channel.description:
Ok, I have the Moparscape Client, and I have had it for a while... I was just on it yesterday playing on my server, but I get up today and try to open it, I get this error:
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I done anything to the Moparscape Client other than try to open it... This is what it says when I edit the runMoparscape.bat [code]@echo off title Running Bot java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup pause[/code]
So....can anyone help?
EDIT: Ugh... I found another problem... When I go to run my server, the box just appears for a second and then it's gone....

item.title: Moparscape Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ok I re-downloaded JDK 6u1, but it still didn’t work, so I checked my paths, and my PATH variable was messed up somehow… Now my runserver.bat works, but not my ServerFile.bat (runserver+compile) and no, I don’t want the Perfect Compiler, I don’t like it. Here is the code that is in my ServerFile.bat:

@echo off title OmgPkScape Server compile+restaRTer tskill java /a javac *.java java -cp .;./jython.jar server
and here is the error I get when I open it:

Could not find process: java 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Starting OmgPkScape on 0.0.0.0:5555
It runs the server, but it doesn’t compile as it should… Anyone know how to fix?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Client Problem
item.description:
@127.0.0.1 wrote:

ive had that prob u need to re-download JDK 6u1

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tr1pl3k1ll Tr1pl3k1ll
item.description:
@Tr1pl3k1ll wrote:

Use Mod Taharok’s perfect complier to run server, and comply it. Also i don’t think re-downloading JDK again will help. Maybe check your paths?

hint: Also virus scan your computer.

  • Tr1p

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I figured out what was wrong… I went into my runserver.bat and looked at the path for the java

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe

And noticed that for some reason, the java.exe was deleted… So I’m re-downloading JDK 6u1 again… hopefully it will help.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Try this for your run server

@echo off title Wisescape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

And you need mod taharoks perfect compiler which is in the tut section

Read full topic

Ok, I have the Moparscape Client, and I have had it for a while… I was just on it yesterday playing on my server, but I get up today and try to open it, I get this error:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

@echo off title Running Bot java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup pause

So…can anyone help?
